subject: Where is the rest of my order?
description_text:
Hello.
On the 5/7 I ordered Simsonn Plus X Simulation Pedals with Haptic Reactor.
Plus X P2-H2 / Black / without Baseplate.
I ordered a Carbon Fiber Heel Plate at the same time.

Order #SSN1927

I'v got the pedals very fast and they are working well.
But, where is the haptic and heel plate?

Hope to hear from you.

Thanks.

Johan Larsson

conversations.body_text: Hi Johan Larsson,    Here's a link to your other package:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047007138983
Hello again.  I just got the second package, the heal plate.  But I still miss the haptic.  Please fix this.  Thanks
Hi Johan Larsson,  Sorry, but the Haptic reactor comes with an optional purchase.

Ahhh... I missunderstood as the are named "with haptic" you should change the name.Anyhow.Can you send a link to the ones i need?Is it the VAM PRO SET (2 PAC/INCLUDING POWER SUPPLY)?Dont want to get this wrong.. again.Ps. The pedals are great. Thank you. DsSkickat från min Galaxy
-------- Originalmeddelande --------Från: service@simsonn.com Datum: 2025-07-23  10:22  (GMT+01:00) Till: n0ssral66@gmail.com Ämne: Re: Where is the rest of my order? 
	
Hi Johan Larsson,
Sorry, but the Haptic reactor comes with an optional purchase.



                          
                            On
                            Tue, 22 Jul at 12:09 PM
                            ,  Johan Larsson <n0ssral66@gmail.com>  wrote:
                            Hello again.
I just got the second package, the heal plate.
But I still miss the haptic.
Please fix this.
Thanks
                          

                        



	






1553:4206036
Hi Johan Larsson,    We apologise for any confusion. You can click on the link to purchase the product, which includes two VAM PROs, a power supply, three mounting brackets, and other accessories.
